Reading through these comments, I see a remarkable socio-cultural clash theme emerging between the US and... the Dutch! The US expresses a sense of entitlement to sit in judgement of murders - "crossing red light lines", beating sex workers with baseball bats, even royalty commits suicide due to sex - based on underlying hypocritical assumptions, values, and fears. And the Dutch instinctively know how privileged the common opinions originating from Western Europe ought to be
